actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that any health insurance carrier that has a governing board a majority of which is composed of physicians or hospital administrators shall not be eligible to be contracted with for purposes of providing health insurance coverage to Federal employees.

summary.text: States that any health insurance carrier which has a board of directors or comparable governing body, the majority of which consists of physicians or hospital administrators, shall not be eligible to be contracted with for the provision of health insurance coverage to Federal employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that any health insurance carrier that has a governing board a majority of which is composed of physicians or hospital administrators shall not be eligible to be contracted with for purposes of providing health insurance coverage to Federal employees.
